alert.note: Alert for Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 5:08PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lea County through 600 PM MDT... At 507 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milnesand, or 27 miles north of Tatum, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tatum, Crossroads, Gladiola and Tatum Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
